title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When the workbench is restarted, the files that were previously opened do not appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list.
EB: The files that were previously opened should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu MRU list when the workbench is restarted.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
